markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Primal Summons](/Feats.aspx?ID=343) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 138 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Call of the Wild](/Feats.aspx?ID=317)

</column>

---

Whenever you summon an ally, you can empower it with the elemental power of air, earth, fire, or water. You gain the [_primal summons_](/Spells.aspx?ID=476) order spell.
name: Primal Summons
